description: Overview* 3D Support:Works for true 3D gaming and 3D home theater applications.* 4K Support:Enables video resolutions of 4096 x 2048* HDMI Ethernet Channel:Adds high-speed full-duplex 100 Mbps Ethernet networking to an HDMI link.* Audio Return Channel:Allows an HDMI-connected TV with a built-in tuner to send audio data "upstream" to a surround audio system, eliminating the need for a separate audio cable.* Content Type Support:Real-time signaling of content types between display and source devices, enabling a TV to optimize picture settings based on content type.* Additional Color Spaces:In addition to RGB color and x.v.Color, it adds support for sYCC601 color, Adobe RGB color and Adobe YCC601 color.Specifications* HDMI Type A Male to HDMI Type A Male 19 Pin Cable* HDMI and Category 2 Certified* HDCP, CEC and ROHS Compliant* Supports DVD Audio, SACD, TrueHD and DTS-HD* Supports Deep Color: 10-bit, 12-bit, and 16-bit (RGB or YCbCr) color depths* Supported Resolutions: Up to 4096 x 2048* Bandwidth: Up to 340 Mhz (10.2 Gbps)* Supports HDMI 1.4 and previous versions* Gold Connectors on Both Ends* Gauge: 28 AWG
title: Cable Matters High Speed HDMI Cable with One 270 Degree Elbow 6 Feet - 3D and 4K Resolution Ready
